snippet: Twenty years later, Bosnia is once again coming apart.
abstract: Op-Ed article by scholar and policy expert Edward P Joseph contends 20th anniversary of Sbrenica massacre offers chance to refocus on unsettled injustices of tragedy; warns peace achieved after Bosnian war is fraying with rise of radical Islam and Russian influence, and those who deny event persist; calls upon Serbs of good faith and international community to reject revisionism and seek justice.
lead_paragraph: Twenty years later, Bosnia is once again coming apart.

headline.main: Are the Lessons of Srebrenica Being Forgotten?

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: War Crimes, Genocide and Crimes Against Humanity
